meanings.definition: Modify (something) to suit a particular individual or task.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys customising her clothes to make them unique.
meanings.sent2: He is customising his bike to fit his style.
meanings.sent3: Customising her phone case with stickers always brings a smile to her face.
meanings.sent4: Just like customising a car, personalizing your workspace can boost productivity.
meanings.sent5: The artist was customising the mural with intricate details, making it truly one-of-a-kind.

meanings.definition: The action of modifying something to suit a particular individual or task.
